Text:

IGNORE THAT ERROR.AND CONTINUE YOUR DOWNLOAD

I've figured out how to open the torrent file in utorrent.i use firefox, so i left click on "magnet link" and hit "copy link location", then in utorrent i hit "file/add torrent from URL...". then paste the long magnet link from Firefox.Unfortunately, there are no seeders or leechers :(An reupload would be so nice.Thanks in advance!
